text: Nicola Badalucco (13 May 1929 - 17 June 2015) was an Italian screenwriter.Scomparso lo sceneggiatore e giornalista Nicola Badalucco He has written for 38 movie since 1969. He was nominated for an Academy Award at the 42nd Academy Awards in the category Original Screenplay for the movie The Damned. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Italian screenwriters Category:Italian journalists Category:Writers from Milan
title: Nicola Badalucco
